pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Friday, June 25, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will address Canadians on the COVID-19 situation. A media availability will follow.

Rideau Cottage
1 Sussex Drive

Notes for media:

  • Restricted coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive to the Princess Anne Entrance no later than 10:45 a.m. and to make their way to the P1 Gate once on the grounds.
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions to the Prime Minister.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-960-7518
    Toll-free: 1-866-805-7923
    Pass code: 6822783#

3:45 p.m. The Prime Minister, joined by the Minister of Employment, Workforce Development and Disability Inclusion Carla Qualtrough and the Parliamentary Secretary to the Minister of Employment, Workforce Development and Disability Inclusion Irek Kusmierczyk, will participate in a roundtable on the Canada Disability Benefit with stakeholders from across the country.

Closed to media.
